message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for sale. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob! I understand your position, but $120 is a bit too low for me.  Could we meet in the middle at $180?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
